titleStmt.title: A plea to an appeale trauersed dialogue wise. By H.B.
titleStmt.author: Burton, Henry, 1578-1648.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Montagu, Richard. Appello Caesarem.
This edition has errata on A4r and N3r; the heart in the title page woodcut is upside-down.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
